result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel A. Conklin

defendant.name: Conklin, Daniel A.
defendant.address: 1400 Hunters Ridge Road #16, Genoa City, WI 53128

records.addlTxt: Minutes:  22CF577/21CM1317.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody (Oshkosh Corr).  Atty Barth not available - in trial.  No appearance by Atty Collier on 21CM1317.  JPTC set over to 12/12/22 @ 2:30pm.  Deft wishes to appear via telephone.  Clerk to set up phone call.

Defendant Daniel A. Conklin appeared with Attorney Michael Robert Barth.  Defendant in custody by writ from Dodge. Attorney Daniel Joseph Tombasco appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's witness is unavailable for prelim on 8/17/22; however, hearing to remain as scheduled per Comm. Keating for purposes of waiving time for prelim.

101PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  No Appearance by DE.  Atty Mike Barth appeared.  Preliminary Hearing set on August 17, 2022 at 09:00 am before Comm , 927-54th Street, Room 157, Kenosha, WI.  Bond continued as previously set.  DE appearance wavied in Prison.  DA to prepare writ for next hrg.  ts

Defendant Daniel A. Conklin in court, in custody.  Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

221PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody.  Clerk JT  Minutes: Attorney status.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 09:15 am.. DE does not want to waive time and will proceed pro se next hearing. DE does not want to waive time and will proceed pro se next hearing. rb

Defendant Daniel A. Conklin in court, in custody.  Attorney Alexander Huber appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes: DE may be eligible for SPD but  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No drug paraphenalia  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with:  All Ulta Cosmetics, Terenza F

122PM   Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Kristyne Watson.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on May 6, 2022 at 09:30 am. $3000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  sg
and witness list filed by the State  kmk
